inclusion.criterion: study staff member will describe the study and offer participation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: sign research protocol and HIPAA consent forms
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: pregnant women in labor or undergoing induction of labor
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: greater than or equal to 18 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: diagnosed with chorioamnionitis as defined by maternal temperature > or = 38.0 degrees Centigrade plus at least one of the following: maternal tachycardia (heart rate >110), fetal tachycardia (fetal heart rate baseline >160), purulent amniotic fluid, uterine tenderness
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: allergy or adverse reaction to penicillin or ampicillin, gentamicin, or sulbactam
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: having received antibiotics for the treatment of preterm premature rupture of membranes or other condition within the last 7 days
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of RRMS and is currently under treatment. She smokes 10 cigarettes per day and drinks alcohol occasionally.
